name: GeoJelly
description:
Born within unknown you instinctively seek for freedom as an experiment defect. In GeoJelly you have to find your way out of a dystopian laboratory through platforming while avoiding traps and collecting diamonds necessary to push forward. Are you gonna find a way out?

Gameplay:

  • Hold to charge, then let go to jump!

- Seems simple? It's only looking simple... hehe

  • Think twice before jump

- You have to be very careful? You don't want to start the level over, do you?

  • Many obstacles await you!

Such as: Cannons, Spikes, Jump Pads, Black holes, windmills

More Features:

  • More than 50 Levels with different themes.
  • Lots of logical puzzles.
  • Game for many hours.
  • You can become a speedrunner in GeoJelly
  • Great Soundtrack
